predicate.note: Frames file for 'embark' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: begin

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: ``In order to restore confidence and ensure the support of our principal lenders,'' Mr. Bond said, ``we embarked on fundamantal changes in the structure and direction of the group.''
example.arg: In order to restore confidence and ensure the support of our principal lenders
fundamantal changes in the structure and direction of the group

roleset.note: Is there also a sense 'get on' or 'depart', as in a travel sense? Or does that only occur in the inverse 'disembark'?
